kv2.3:1.3: Atthi arahato vicikicchā vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ vicikicchāsaṁyojanaṁ vicikicchānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.3:2.1: Natthi arahato vicikicchā vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ vicikicchāsaṁyojanaṁ vicikicchānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.3:2.3: Hañci natthi arahato vicikicchā vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ vicikicchāsaṁyojanaṁ vicikicchānīvaraṇaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.3:3.1: Atthi puthujjanassa kaṅkhā, atthi tassa vicikicchā vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ vicikicchāsaṁyojanaṁ vicikicchānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.3:3.3: Atthi arahato kaṅkhā, atthi tassa vicikicchā vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ vicikicchāsaṁyojanaṁ vicikicchānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.3:4.1: Atthi arahato kaṅkhā, natthi tassa vicikicchā vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ vicikicchāsaṁyojanaṁ vicikicchānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.3:4.3: Atthi puthujjanassa kaṅkhā, natthi tassa vicikicchā vicikicchāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ vicikicchāsaṁyojanaṁ vicikicchānīvaraṇanti?
kv2.3:5.3: Atthi arahato satthari kaṅkhā, dhamme kaṅkhā, saṅghe kaṅkhā, sikkhāya kaṅkhā, pubbante kaṅkhā, aparante kaṅkhā, pubbantāparante kaṅkhā, idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhāti?
kv2.3:6.1: Natthi arahato satthari kaṅkhā, dhamme kaṅkhā …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhāti?
kv2.3:6.3: Hañci natthi arahato satthari kaṅkhā, dhamme kaṅkhā …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.3:7.1: Atthi puthujjanassa kaṅkhā, atthi tassa satthari kaṅkhā, dhamme kaṅkhā …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhāti?
kv2.3:7.3: Atthi arahato kaṅkhā, atthi tassa satthari kaṅkhā, dhamme kaṅkhā …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhāti?
kv2.3:8.1: Atthi arahato kaṅkhā, natthi tassa satthari kaṅkhā, dhamme kaṅkhā …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhāti?
kv2.3:8.3: Atthi puthujjanassa kaṅkhā, natthi tassa satthari kaṅkhā, dhamme kaṅkhā …pe… idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhāti?
kv2.3:9.3: Nanu arahato rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṅkato āyatiṁ anuppādadhammoti?
kv2.3:9.5: Hañci arahato rāgo pahīno ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṅkato āyatiṁ anuppādadhammo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.3:10.15: sacchikātabbaṁ sacchikataṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.3:11.2: Sadhammakusalassa arahato atthi kaṅkhā, paradhammakusalassa arahato natthi kaṅkhāti.
kv2.3:13.1: Sadhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, atthi tassa kaṅkhāti?
kv2.3:13.3: Paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, atthi tassa kaṅkhāti?
kv2.3:14.16: paradhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, natthi tassa kaṅkhāti?
kv2.3:14.18: Sadhammakusalassa arahato rāgo pahīno, natthi tassa kaṅkhāti?
kv2.3:16.4: “jānatohaṁ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṁ khayaṁ vadāmi, no ajānato no apassato.
kv2.3:16.5: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jānato kiṁ passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti?
kv2.3:16.8: evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato āsavānaṁ khayo hotī”ti.
kv2.3:17.4: “jānatohaṁ, bhikkhave, passato āsavānaṁ khayaṁ vadāmi, no ajānato no apassato.
kv2.3:17.5: Kiñca, bhikkhave, jānato kiṁ passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti?
kv2.3:17.7: ‘ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā’ti jānato passato āsavānaṁ khayo hoti.
kv2.3:17.8: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, jānato evaṁ passato āsavānaṁ khayo hotī”ti.
kv2.3:18.4: “sabbaṁ, bhikkhave, anabhijānaṁ aparijānaṁ avirājayaṁ appajahaṁ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāya;
kv2.3:18.5: sabbañca kho, bhikkhave, abhijānaṁ parijānaṁ virājayaṁ pajahaṁ bhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā”ti.
kv2.3:20.4: “yasmiṁ, bhikkhave, samaye ariyasāvakassa virajaṁ vītamalaṁ dhammacakkhuṁ udapādi—
kv2.3:20.5: ‘yaṁ kiñci samudayadhammaṁ sabbaṁ taṁ nirodhadhamman’ti, saha dassanuppādā, bhikkhave, ariyasāvakassa tīṇi saṁyojanāni pahīyanti—
kv2.3:25.1: Yā kāci kaṅkhā idha vā huraṁ vā,
kv2.3:27.2: Na tattha kiṁ kaṅkhati koci sāvako;
kv2.3:29.4: Nanu arahā itthipurisānaṁ nāmagotte kaṅkheyya, maggāmagge kaṅkheyya, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṁ nāme kaṅkheyyāti?
kv2.3:29.6: Hañci arahā itthipurisānaṁ nāmagotte kaṅkheyya, maggāmagge kaṅkheyya, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṁ nāme kaṅkheyya;
kv2.3:30.1: Arahā itthipurisānaṁ nāmagotte kaṅkheyya, maggāmagge kaṅkheyya, tiṇakaṭṭhavanappatīnaṁ nāme kaṅkheyyāti, atthi arahato kaṅkhāti?
kv2.3:30.3: Arahā sotāpattiphale vā sakadāgāmiphale vā anāgāmiphale vā arahatte vā kaṅkheyyāti?
